snippet.title: Silhouette - Hand-tracking 👋 VR puzzle game 🧩 - Out Now
snippet.description:
Using only your hands 👋,  cast shadows to solve challenging puzzles in this relaxing and casual adventure game.

Silhouette is OUT NOW on Meta Quest Store 👉 https://ocul.us/3WqzsYM

Explore the island and manipulate shadows, light, walls, and environments to guide the gentle shadow creatures, The Shaodwies, to safety. This hand-tracking game is played completely without controllers.

Key Features:
        🧩 28 unique puzzles
        🤚Hand-tracking controls
        🎶 Cozy soundtrack
        🏖️ Tranquil environments

Pro Tip! 💡 For the best experience with hand-tracking, make sure to keep your hands in your line of sight and your room well lit. Please note that Silhouette is a hand-tracking only game.
